definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means

sentences.english: He is one upon his opponent.
Mothers of twins won again in the length of their reproductive period.
sentences.chinese: 在育齡期的長度而言，雙胞胎的母親們也略勝一籌。

sentences.english: In teaching grammar, Professor Wang can be a notch above all the other professors.
sentences.chinese: 論教語法，王教授要比學院其他任何人都略勝一籌。

sentences.english: While some people are more analytical, others are more creative.
sentences.chinese: 有些人分析力比較強，而有些人創造力略勝一籌。
